testCases.label: Verify create_tuple constructs a tuple with given elements
testCases.description: Checks that create_tuple(1, 2, 3) returns the tuple (1, 2, 3). This lab exercise tests the ability to create a tuple from multiple values.

testCases.label: Verify access_element retrieves the correct element by index
testCases.description: Checks that access_element((1, 2, 3), 1) returns 2. This lab exercise tests indexing operations on tuples.

testCases.label: Verify concatenate_tuples joins two tuples
testCases.description: Checks that concatenate_tuples((1, 2), (3, 4)) returns (1, 2, 3, 4). This lab exercise tests tuple concatenation.

testCases.label: Verify repeat_tuple repeats a tuple multiple times
testCases.description: Checks that repeat_tuple((1, 2), 3) returns (1, 2, 1, 2, 1, 2). This lab exercise tests repeating tuples using multiplication.

testCases.label: Verify check_membership detects an element in a tuple
testCases.description: Checks that check_membership((1, 2, 3), 2) returns True and check_membership((1, 2, 3), 4) returns False. This lab exercise tests membership operations in tuples.

testCases.label: Verify check_non_membership detects an element not in a tuple
testCases.description: Checks that check_non_membership((1, 2, 3), 4) returns True and check_non_membership((1, 2, 3), 2) returns False. This lab exercise tests non-membership operations in tuples.

testCases.label: Verify tuple_length returns the correct length of a tuple
testCases.description: Checks that tuple_length((1, 2, 3)) returns 3. This lab exercise tests retrieving the length of a tuple.

testCases.label: Verify tuple_slicing returns a correct slice of a tuple
testCases.description: Checks that tuple_slicing((1, 2, 3, 4, 5), 1, 4) returns (2, 3, 4). This lab exercise tests slicing tuples using start and end indices.

testCases.label: Verify count_occurrences counts the number of times an element appears
testCases.description: Checks that count_occurrences((1, 2, 2, 3, 2), 2) returns 3. This lab exercise tests counting specific values in a tuple.

testCases.label: Verify find_index returns the first index of an element in a tuple
testCases.description: Checks that find_index((1, 2, 3, 2, 4), 2) returns 1. This lab exercise tests finding the index of the first occurrence of a value in a tuple.
